level.heading: General powers of the commissioner.
level.text: ยง 24-105 General powers of the commissioner. Subject to the provisions of this code, the commissioner may take such action as may be necessary to control the emission of air contaminant which causes or may cause, by itself or in combination with other air contaminant, detriment to the safety, health, welfare or comfort of the public or to a part thereof, injury to plant and animal life, or damage to property or business. The commissioner may exercise or delegate any of the functions, powers and duties vested in him or her or in the department by this code. The commissioner may adopt such rules, regulations and procedures as may be necessary to effectuate the purposes of this chapter.
